# GitHub Actions Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show CI status:

## Main CI Status
```markdown
[![CI](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
```

## Linux Compatibility
```markdown
[![Linux Compatibility](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/linux-compatibility.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/linux-compatibility.yml)
```

## Security and Dependencies
```markdown
[![Security and Dependencies](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/security-deps.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/security-deps.yml)
```

## Combined Badge Example
```markdown
[![CI](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![Linux](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/linux-compatibility.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/tothambrus11/r1cs-swift/actions/workflows/linux-compatibility.yml)

```
